primevc.gui.layout.IScrollableLayout

type
interface
implements
IAdvancedLayoutClient
ILayoutContainer

Instance Variables

minScrollXPos(default,setMinScrollXPos) : Int

The minimum value of the scrollX position (<= 0). This is number is set by a layoutalgorithm when there are children with a negative x-position.

minScrollYPos(default,setMinScrollYPos) : Int

The minimum value of the scrollY position (<= 0). This is number is set by a layoutalgorithm when there are children with a negative y-position.

scrollPos(default,null) : primevc.core.geom.BindablePoint

horizontal and vertical scroll position

scrollableHeight(getScrollableHeight,null) : Int

The total height of the container that is invisible and can be scrolled

scrollableWidth(getScrollableWidth,null) : Int

The total width of the container that is invisible and can be scrolled

Instance Methods

horScrollable() : Bool

Method will return if the container is horizontal scrollable

validateScrollPosition(pos : primevc.core.geom.IntPoint) : primevc.core.geom.IntPoint

Method will tell if the coordinates of the given point are valid values for the scrollposition or not. If the coordinates are invalid it will change them to valid positions.

verScrollable() : Bool

Method will return if the container is vertical scrollable
